description.value: Your time living off the land has taught you that with enough care, many useful items can be created from naturally-occurring materials. You can use your Survival modifier instead of your Crafting modifier on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.omioiKwEf6AFyBBP]{Craft a Project}. Additionally, you can use Survival in place of Crafting for the purposes of meeting the requirements to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.LkGmdi4CzHghHhjA]{Begin a Project} or Craft a Project and to qualify for feats that fulfill crafting requirements, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xWY5omyIcILNR7y1]{Magical Crafting}.
